price: 32. Et quand ils les voyaient, ils disaient : « Ceux-là sont vraiment égarés ! »
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
